name: Durga Mata
description: Durga Mata, bred by Paradise Seeds, is an indica-driven strain. Despite being 90% indica, it acts unlike other predominately indica strains. With flavors best described as reminiscent of Turkish Delight, it offers a long-lasting relaxing body buzz without the couch potato effect. This strain has a natural resistance to pests and survives through rough treatment, which makes it a recommended choice for beginners and outdoor growers.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Giggly, Uplifted, Creative, Happy, Stress, Depression, Inflammation, Lack of Appetite, Headaches, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth
